snippet: The effort to slash tax rates and to cover the cost in savings from entitlement programs is seen by critics as futile.
abstract: House Republicans will return from spring recess to face the difficult task of filling the gaping holes in the House-passed budget, including figuring out how to slash income tax rates without costing the government any money; they will also have to find nearly $3 trillion in savings from entitlement programs over the next decade.
lead_paragraph: The effort to slash tax rates and to cover the cost in savings from entitlement programs is seen by critics as futile.

headline.seo: House Republicans to Tackle Federal Budget
headline.main: House Republicans to Tackle Ambitious Budget
headline.print_headline: House Republicans to Tackle Ambitious Budget

keywords.value: House Committee on Ways and Means
keywords.name: organizations
